description:
The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh’s palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!  Meanwhile, Yugi and friends search for the only door within the endless labyrinth of the Puzzle that leads to ancient Egypt, but how can they find a door that even the Pharaoh couldn’t find?  If they can’t find the exit, they’ll be lost in the labyrinth forever!
Source: crunchyroll
